title: Automation & Marketing Systems Specialist
job_overview:
???? Now Hiring: Automation & Marketing Systems Lead
About Logos Health
Logos Health is a Christ-centered integrative and functional medicine practice based in North Carolina, USA, founded and led by Dr. Alesha Logan, NP. We serve children and adults through both Direct Primary Care and high-impact, premium wellness programs focused on hormone health, metabolic optimization, gut healing, weight loss, and more.

We are a fast-growing, mission-driven practice dedicated to whole-person care and medical freedom. As we continue to scale our programs and serve more patients, we are looking for a tech-savvy, proactive automation and marketing expert based in the Philippines to join our remote team.

???? Who We're Looking For
We’re in search of a skilled Systems Integrator & Automation Specialist to streamline and scale our operations through automation, lead generation, CRM management, and efficient tech integrations. Your role will be critical in helping us generate, nurture, and convert leads, improve patient onboarding, and automate delivery of program education.

???? Key Responsibilities
You will support and improve the following areas:

Lead Generation & Ad Integration

Create and optimize Upgrade to see actual info for Facebook Ads and other lead sources

Sales Funnels & CRM

Build out funnels and workflows that convert leads into paying clients

Client Nurturing & Email Automation

Create campaigns for both cold leads and existing clients (education, upsell, re-engagement)

Client Onboarding

Automate onboarding tasks for patients enrolled in wellness and medical programs

Patient Education Delivery

Set up timed content delivery (emails, video, handouts, etc.) over the course of a 12–16 week program

???? Our Current Tech Stack
You’ll be helping us streamline and integrate the following tools:

Elation (EHR): Used for medical charting, visit documentation, and patient scheduling (HIPAA-compliant platform).

Spruce (Messaging + VOIP): Central hub for secure patient communications (calls, texts, app messaging).

Hint Health (Billing + Membership): Manages DPC memberships and wellness programs. Integrates with Stripe for payment processing.

Flodesk (Email Marketing): Used for email automations, list management, and lead magnet delivery.

Zentake (Digital Forms): For patient intake and onboarding documents.

Slack (Internal Team Communication): Used for daily communication with our virtual and in-person team.

Zoom (Meetings & Webinars): Used for group coaching, webinars, and virtual consults.

Teachable (Online Courses): Where we host and deliver educational video content for select programs.

Google Workspace: For forms, drive storage, and document collaboration.

???? Note: We are currently lacking a comprehensive CRM and are considering platforms like GoHighLevel. Your input on this will be valuable!

? Ideal Candidate Profile
???? Proven experience in CRM setup, sales funnels, automated onboarding, and lead generation

?? Bonus if you’ve worked with healthcare, functional medicine, or direct primary care

???? Strong understanding of HIPAA-compliant workflows

???? Familiarity with tools like GoHighLevel, ClickFunnels, or Keragon

???? Excellent English and communication skills, both written and verbal

???? Tech-savvy, self-motivated, and solution-oriented

???? Bonus: Experience with Elation, Hint, or Spruce

???? Application Instructions
To apply, please reply with a short video answering the following:

?Introduce yourself (name, location, and years of experience in automation and marketing)

?What experience do you have in healthcare or HIPAA-compliant systems?

?Availability (When can you start and do you currently have another job?)

?Your proposal (in under 5 minutes): How would you connect and automate our current platforms? Which CRM or additional tools would you recommend to streamline our process?

???? Start Date
ASAP – Flexible for the right candidate

???? Job Type & Hours
Freelance/Part-Time (with potential for Full-Time)

Flexible Hours (PH Timezone okay, must overlap with 2–4 hours of EST at least 2x/week)

???? To Learn More
Visit Upgrade to see actual info to learn about our mission and services.
